snippet.title: Gothic Classic Switch Port | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The classic is back. The old classic version of Gothic 1 ported to Nintendo Switch with native gamepad UI, controls, and numerous fixes!

Return to the Colony on the go, when Gothic Classic is coming soon on Nintendo Switch!

You can find all listed fixes and updates here: https://thqn.net/3qdQFL8

- Links & Info - 
Nintendo eShop: thqn.net/gc-nsw
Website: gothic-game.com 
Discord: discord.gg/gothic 

- Socials -  
YouTube: youtube.com/THQNordic  
Twitter: twitter.com/gothicthegame 
Facebook: facebook.com/THQNordic 
Instagram: instagram.com/thqnordic  
TikTok: tiktok.com/@thqnordic  
Twitch: twitch.tv/thqnordic  

#Gothic
